patthana12.4:1.1: Nahetuṃ nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṃ noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.4:2.1: Nahetuṃ nooghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṃ noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.4:3.1: Nahetuṃ nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.4:4.1: Nahetuṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
